General.Name: Anhui Zhonghuan Environmental Protection Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Anhui Zhonghuan Environmental Protection Technology Co.,Ltd engages in the municipal sewage, industrial wastewater treatment, black and odorous water, wetland treatment, other water environment treatment, and waste incineration power generation businesses in China. The company offers services, including municipal sewage and rural sewage, industrial wastewater, and comprehensive treatment; construction, operation, and maintenance of sewage pipe network; sludge, food waste, and landfill leachate treatment, and garbage incineration power generation; and solar power generation business. Anhui Zhonghuan Environmental Protection Technology Co.,Ltd was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Hefei, China.

1.Name: Mr. Hu  Xinquan
1.Title: Director, CFO & Sec. to the Board
